mapper.sql: id, shop_id, inventory, price, discount_price, discount, hot, recommend, sales, pic, price_region, type, sex, age_region, category, create_time, update_time, create_id, update_id, validity
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from product
order by ${orderByClause}
